casebody.data:
APPEALS ACCEPTED FOR REVIEW

2013-1833. Fed. Home Loan Mtge. Corp. v. Koch.

Geauga App. No. 2012-G-3084, 2013-Ohio-4423. Discretionary appeal accepted on Proposition of Law No. II only; cause held for the decision in 2013-0304, Bank of Am., N.A. v. Kuchta, 9th Dist. Medina No. 12CA0025-M, 2012-Ohio-5562; and briefing schedule stayed.

Pfeifer and O’Donnell, JJ., concur but would accept both propositions of law. Lanzinger, French, and O’Neill, JJ., dissent.
